images.description: SDSS image of region near lenticular galaxy NGC 307 and the star listed as NGC 308; also shown is the star listed as NGC 310, and PGC 3325895, which is sometimes misidentified as NGC 310
SDSS image of lenticular galaxy NGC 307 and the star listed as NGC 308
SDSS image centered on lenticular galaxy PGC 212626, also showing NGC 307
